name: Jimmy Morrow
text: I have heard nothing but positive reviews from family and friends

name: CarRUS OMG
text: I have bought several trailers from Topline and I have had nothing but positive experience with this company. The trailers are very well built and the staff is very helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this place for anyone shopping for a quality built trailer.

name: Darryl Gunn
text: I bought one of their trailers as a package deal thru Haney tractors the trailer was deleived to me in Va it has no breakaway box or battery and also no plate holder. I've been in touch with Haney tractors they had me on three way call with top line was told they will send me the breakaway kit. It was 10 days later still no breakaway box. I then emailed them was told they would send it right out that's been another 5 days. I would not trust the people to buy a trailer from.

name: Remain Nameless
text: Ward.... you were a little hard on the Beaver. The worst place in Oxford is on the south side of Hwy 78 East. The BEST place is A&B and they are located on the north side of 78 just east of Hutch Touch. I'm in retail sales in the trailer industry myself and A & B Trailers is my go to source for information, parts, and trailers. If  I have a question about ANYTHING in regards to dragging a wagon... A&B Trailers.. Knowledge level? I'll put it this way; theres not anything they can't  cover on your trailer.  I promise, they will never lead you wrong. These guys are not pencil pushers that have sit behind a desk all of their lives. They are blue collar, hard working, hands on, highly experienced fabricators and they know their stuff. If you want to spend half of your retirement on junk just to have it fall apart in a few months, then go across the street and shop with Ward. Now if you want an extremely well built, solid piece of equipment at a reasonable price  from an excellent company that stands behind their product AND appreciates their customers?... Welcome home family!! You are in the right place. A&B Trailers. You won't find better people anywhere and let me just add this in there.... these cats are Perfectionists. I know. I have worked side by side with them in a fab shop and I am a perfectionist also, but these jokers....well they take it to a whole nother other level. I will take an oath to say, "They do things at A&B with a whole bunch of heart and a truck load of pride. It's done once, done right, and that's the product they will provide you every single time. I highly recommend A&B Trailers for all of your parts, accessories,  tires, wheels, batteries, or even if you are looking to upgrade with a brand new piece of pride attached to your vehicle.. Come on down to A&B. I'm sure glad I stopped here. Received a solid product and made two friends for life. Where else can you get service like that? A&B Trailers. Ask for Andy or Barney. NO need in referencing my review. They'll know who sent ya when you call them by their names 🤣

name: Helen White
text: I orginally posted a 5 star for this company. But after the delivery of building I purchased, very disappointing experience.  The delivery driver charged an additional $100 for the height and still wasn't at the height for the charge. We had to redo all blocks because it wasn't level or supported correctly. Was basically told not responseable for third party, I didn't purchase it from third party purchased from this business.

name: Fred Luhn
text: Always a great experience here. Guys there are always helpful and pleasant to work with.

name: Yansi Taboada
text: Truly amazing

name: Ian Hutchins
text: Always been a good experience and the staff has always been nice!

name: Jack Witteveen
text: to those of you who have posted a negative comment, tell the whole story so that we all can understand!! thank you

name: Wesley Elkins
text: Rude staff and we're no help I wouldn't stop here if I were you

name: MIKE Armstrong
text: Gentleman & scholar, fun to play with & loved his music

name: Paul Kuehn
text: I can’t say enough good about how Brandon took care of me. A couple of buddies and I were traveling back from Daytona Beach to Arkansas when we experienced a tire separation and broken leaf spring on the trailer. Brandon saved our trip by providing outstanding service to get us back on the road safely. He even gave us a great restaurant recommendation since we were all hungry. Thanks again for the prompt customer service.

name: J Irby
text: I highly suggest anyone to shop here. I will not be buying anything trailer related from anyone else. I was very satisfied with the service I received. I would give more stars if I could.

name: Conner Jung
text: Great group that will help you out in anyways and make suggestions on what you should do or don't have to worry about. They aren't there to rip you off. They are there to help and get you back on the water as quick as possible. They have great prices that you can't hardly find anywhere.

name: Daniel Payton
text: This is my new go-to spot for all things trailer related. Best customer service in town hands down.

name: Vaughn Traywick
text: Brandon and his crew did a great job setting up a trailer for my new boat.  They even notified me (and photographed) a few major issues with the actual boat that I will get resolved with the manufacturer.  This is outstanding customer service.

name: Scott Dauenheimer
text: They have everything you need to repair a trailer or buy a new boat trailer at the best price I could find any where within 100 miles.

name: JWDozer
text: Very impatient.  Looking at a boat that was still on the internet... "don't have it bye!"

name: divots dad
text: Brandon and his staff  offer the BEST prices and service in Mobile hands down!

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Johnathan Schemerhorn
text: Great honest operation here I called 20 trailer places in the entire area only one who called me back and got me a trailer Fast and fair prices

name: Ryan Brightman
text: Brandon was a life saver this weekend.  I had a hub blow out on the side of the road on a Saturday.  Brandon was nice enough to meet me at his shop on a Saturday to sell me a hub to get me going.  Best customer service experience I have had in years.

name: Jason Riemann
text: Best place in Mobile for Quality trailer parts and service, boat sales, and engiine service. 4 tires and wheels installed and engine serviced in a few hours! More fishing time.  Can’t recommend anyone else.

name: Travis Poling
text: Great in every way! Friendly service and GREAT prices and selection. THE place to go for everything boat trailer related.

name: Josh McNickle
text: I purchased a boat from recreational sales and service just over a year ago and was very pleased with service received from Brandon during my purchase. I have and will continue to refer people to recreational sales and service for all boating and trailer needs. Great place!

name: Glen Chaplin
text: Have used several times and always had great service.  Have called ahead to see if they could stay past closing time for me to pick up what I needed!

name: chad palmer
text: We have a multi boat charter business and could not do it without these guys. Fast super friendly and great in stock inventory

name: Thomas Miller
text: Great service. Will definitely go back

name: Ben Nelson
text: Excellent selection of trailer parts in stock

name: Reese Swartz
text: Man, what a bunch of nice guys!  Great transaction!

name: Jon Dreaden
text: If you need trailer parts or service,  this is the only place to go.  Very friendly staff.

name: Robert Rhodes
text: Brandon and his staff always have what we need at great prices & great service.

name: Michael Robinson
text: Best place to get what you need for your trailer

name: riverrat1946@yahoo.com Lunceford
text: Great place to get your boat fixed or tailer parts and repaired

name: Greg Callaghan
text: Brandon is very knowledgeable, I was looking for boat trailer parts

name: Aaron Allen
text: Needed help on the side of the road and not from the area. Brandon was refered to us and had everything to get us going. Thanks

name: Judson Taylor
text: Excellent customer service. Friendly. I got just what I needed no extras.

name: jonathan brown
text: You may have 99 problems a trailer problem shouldn't be on that lost with a place like this. Brandon has got it together, Mobile has needed a place like this for a long time.

name: Shirley Olson
text: Very professional and polite

name: David Rinaldi
text: Done right. Done quick

name: Marc Mott
text: Everything you need for your trailer and more.

name: Butch W.
text: Knoesgable and Friendly

name: Rod Cromer
text: Knowledgeable,  friendly and helpful

name: Hayden Lunceford
text: Nice place to do business.

name: H Pipkins
text: Great service!

name: Brandon Lunceford
text: Was blown away buy the inventory and cheap prices.

name: Patrick Osborne
text: The 20’ car hauler is an amazing trailer. It pulls so much better than my last trailer.  Great people and and great trailers.  Had several compliments on how good the trailer looks as well.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Patrick!  Glad your enjoying your new trailer!

name: Joanna /Truckers Post LLC - Get Approved Today
text: We had one of our customers place an order to have a trailer built and the finishing product was excellent. Both Hayley & Tisha were a pleasure to work with. It does take a little longer to receive a response however, I do understand that they're very busy. Other than that, the transaction went smooth and the trailer was built in a timely manner.

name: Jc Gough
text: Trailer tongue is not built right they're not brace . when they mount the tongue on it and welds all over the trailer have to get somebody to reweld the trailer I have one of there trailer and the tongue broke and I called them and they wanted to charge me for to redo it like it was 16,000 trailer 9000 lb on it broke the tongue I would not recommend these trailers to nobody

name: Oscar Ayala
text: Bought one of their trailers from a dealer. After encountering various issues with the trailer I was reached out to by Stryker and we came to an agreement to get my issues remedied. The customer service I was directly provided from the company was beyond my expectations. I highly recommend this company to everyone. They have had their issues in the past under previous leadership but this new leadership is 10,000 times better.

name: Ethan Riegel
text: I purchased a 24' trailer from Stryker, I had very exact dimensions I needed met and the trailer is within a 16th of an inch in every dimension. The trailer is extremely sturdy and solidly built. They came out 1000$ dollars cheaper than any other quote I got. My only complaint is on the time to complete the job, 10 weeks is a bit longer than I would have liked. However, at the end of the day the trailer is amazing.

resp.text: Ethan, thank you for the feedback... we really appreciate the review. We are under new management and our build times have shortened dramatically. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Trey Haisten
text: I Purchased a Pontoon Trailer from Stryker's retail lot last week and it was everything I wanted at a great price!! Beautiful trailer that is well built by a great brand. The Sales Representative was really friendly and made the entire transaction smooth. In fact the whole experience was great for me! If I buy a trailer in the future, I am buying Stryker Trailers!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Trey!  It was a pleasure meeting you!  Enjoy that new boat!

name: pierce carpenter
text: These trailers & company are a poor excuse of being the two things I mentioned. Company & trailers. First of all the 16ft dump trailer I purchased was so poorly made that the decals were put on crooked, paint was sprayed spotty on & runs everywhere. I drove 3 hours to pick it up & it wasn't as described when I arrived. That was the dealers fault, but the trailer was built so bad it should have never been sent out for sale. The back doors would never shut all the way, it would not lift over 3.8 tons to be exact, the cylinders were welded on crooked so when you lifted it up the popped very loud from being out of alignment & then the frame broke where the dump bed pivots. all this within 5 loads hauled. Called the dealer & that was a no go. Called the factory several times & pretty much was told that they hired some unskilled contractors to build the trailers at one time & mine was one of them. I then ask Justin the manager what do I need to do because I have to have it to work we agreed that I would take my loss & Stryker would put in 1000.00 towards a new trailer that was safe & road worthy so I could get back to work. Even though that puts me thousands out of pocket to get back to work I was in agreement with Justin just so I could get back to work. I bought a brand new trailer, a MaxXd which is the real deal & now Stryker will not talk to me, help me or anything. I was able to talk to one guy on the phone since Justin & I made the deal & I was told that I was out of luck. Great way to handle business. I told Justin I wouldn't put a review as long as he stuck to his end of the deal, he didn't. Probably the worst company I've done business with. You would think if a company that sells trailers that are designed to go up & down the highway would make sure that they were safe, not say we had unqualified people building them. Still hard to believe.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Pierce. I'm sorry you were unhappy with your Stryker Trailer and wish we could have worked something out with you to get the issue resolved. Feel free to contact us if you ever need anything in the future. Thanks!

name: John Lane
text: This company is impossible to deal with.  We ordered a dozen trailers and we were going to be a dealer for them, we were told two weeks for the delivery.  Three weeks later we are told we will not be getting any trailers.  Never going to do business with this company.

name: Tyler Isgett
text: I have been waiting over four weeks for my boat trailer and they still have not completed the build nor shipped it.  They put in the wrong ticket the first time and then it goes lost in their production and put in the back of the line.  Then it was being shipped but it never showed up.  When we called it actually was not built yet.  WTH?!?  Then it is done but they ran out of carpet!  I don't understand how that happens.  Then the carpet is supposed to be there on Monday.  Didn't happen because they actually did not order until Monday.  Full of excuses and it sounds like poor management to lose tickets and run out of inventory.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Tyler!  I know the past 8 weeks have been tough for everyone with all the COVID-19 issues.  We're hoping that everything gets back to normal soon so we can all get back to work.  Feel free to contact us in the future if you ever need anything.  Thanks!

name: Robert Banks
text: Drove to south Atlanta to look at a 7x24 power tilt car trailer , the paint on it was a crappie paint job and had scrapes on the top of both fenders, the metal bed was flimsy and bowed to me walking on it , for it to be 10,500 axles it should have had thicker metal

name: Taylor Phillips
text: Love my new 7x16 dump! Works great, looks great. Was built perfectly.

resp.text:
Taylor,
It was a pleasure serving you and thanks for the review!

name: larry kendrick
text: Trailers are very poorly manufactured with short weak welds, painted poorly, the ramps are constructed poorly. Don't buy this trailer unless your getting it super cheap because you will have to redo the ramp mounts, the ramps and reweld the whole thing. My new trailer I got in today was sold to me cheap enough for me to rework it, I'm just warning you folks, if you don't know how to weld you'll be in trouble with this rig.

resp.text:
Larry,
We apologize for the issues with your trailer. I tried to look up your name to find the order to see what type of trailer your purchased... and to back track the build process to see what may have occurred as the quality you decsribe does not sound like one of our trailers... I can't find you anywhere in our system. Are you sure it was a Stryker Trailer? If so, please give our office a call so we can see which dealer you purchased from and find out more about this situation. Thank you for your review.

name: Chris Cunningham
text: I drove there to get some tires and they said that I had a 5 1/2 bolt pattern and they didn't carry that size. I didn't have a 5 1/2 bolt pattern and they had my size. I left

name: Jennifer Copeland
text: Brandy and the rest of the staff were very friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. Price and trailer quality were amazing!

resp.text: Jennifer, Thanks for your review! Will pass on your kudos to Brandi and the staff. Thanks again!

name: wes lammey
text: Cheaply built junk. They cut every corner you can imagine. You can get a much better built trailer for the same money. Trailer brakes and lights started working periodically. It’s to far for me to take back for warranty so local trailer service place fixed for me.  They said they ran the trailer wiring with absolutely no slack in the wiring. When the trailer started flexing the connections to the brakes pulled apart. The welds on the ramps broke within a month of use. The tube that the ramps hinge on has warped and the ramps sit at an angle. The cross members are 2” angle,  24” on center instead of “C” channel . I got a quote for $600 to remove the deck and use “c” channel every 16” on center and then screw the deck down. They didn’t even screw the deck boards down, so they slide around. The paint rubs off if anything touches it. There are a lot of sharp edges that I had to knock down because it was just dangerous to walk around. Apparently the trailer that I saw and thought I was buying was “upgraded” and I didn’t request that. I took it for DOT inspection and i had to spend $150 to have side marker lights installed on it. They didn’t even build the trailer to dot specs. At the point that they finally got the trailer to me 2-3 weeks after I was told it would be there, I needed the trailer to work that day so I just signed the papers and took off. Now I wish I had looked a little closer. Don’t make the same mistake I did. This place is a joke.

resp.text: Wes, we apologize for your experience. We are striving to serve our customers better. We are under new management and the quality issues you raised have been corrected. Again, we apologize and hope to earn your trust back if you need another trailer in the future. Thank you for the feedback.

name: Russ Lassiter
text: Great folks and excellent products!  I highly recommend Stryker Trailers!

resp.text:
Russ,
Thanks for the review!

name: Justin Copeland
text: Great people pushing out a quality product!  These guys rock!

resp.text:
Justin,
We really appreciate your review... our customers rock too!
Thanks!

name: Cedric Kennedy
text: I purchased a 6 x 14 dump trailer with 3 ft sides. I had it for 90 days using it a couple times per week hauling residential debris. I do eviction and clean up services so nothing Ive ever dumped was over 1.3 tons. Per the distributor the trailer is rated for 3 tons. After 90 days of use my tires are showing wire. I took it to the dealer and he found that the rear spring mounts broke from the frame causing the axle to shift and that’s the reason for the tire wear. We sent the trailer for warranty repair and the manufacturer said it was my fault. I must have backed against something and broke them. The welded the trailer but did not replace the worn tires. I was warned by other contractors to not buy this brand of trailer because they were not a good quality but I didn’t listen. I figured a cheap trailer could haul residential debris but I was wrong. I’m not upset because I believe you get what you pay for. In this case I feel like I received less than I paid for. Just a Heads up. Don’t buy this brand of trailer. Spend a little more money for a better built trailer. Not to mention when I dropped the trailer off I went a few miles away and there was a Stryker trailer that the rear wheel had fell of complete with the hub assembly on the side of the road. Again. Don’t buy this brand of trailer.

resp.text:
Cedric,
We apologize for your experience. We are striving to serve our customers better. We are under new management and the quality issues you raised have been corrected. Again, we apologize and hope to earn your trust back if you need another trailer in the future. Sincerely, thank you for the feedback.

name: Tom Klein
text:
Been emailing them about a Harley Hauler since 12/2016. Quick response with pics and pricing. When I did finally get back to them the following month I was dealing with a different person. Finally decided and placed order  on 3/20/17. Was told the same "turnaround time will be about a couple of weeks". On 4/7/2017 I emailed and asked how the progress was...No Reply.
Emailed again on 4/11 and was told that they are behind and when they do get around to it they will call to see if I still want it. What!! Very crappy and deceitful customer service. Not worth the $300-$400 savings. Website says they are a customer service focused company. I wonder if they even know it's there?
Going to buy from a reputable GA company instead.

name: Emmett Ashe
text: Great experience. Made the drive from Georgia for a trailer to haul a SxS. Spoke with brandi on the phone twice and she helped me find the right one for me once I got there. Everyone working there were super friendly and helpful. I ended up with a 6.4x12 and paid at least $400 less than anywhere I found in GA

resp.text: Emmett, thank you for the feedback... we really appreciate the review. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Perry Ellison
text: The price was good but paint was super thin. Right at 3 years old and rust everywhere. I have a 16 year old trailer that looks new compared to their 3 year old trailer. I bought both trailers new. Trailer brakes never worked. I tried to get them to fix before I left and they said it was my truck. All my other trailers work fine. 150 mile trip wasn't worth taking it back for them to fix.

name: Art Of Valor
text: Under new ownership. Good prices and quality. Also good employment opportunities!

resp.text: J, thank you for the feedback... we really appreciate the review. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Douglas Dye
text: Put an order for a custom built gooseneck for a tiny house. Sent them the "DETAILED" drawing of the trailer design (dimensions, material specs, the works), even talked to Jake over the phone to make sure we were both on the same page as to what I wanted. Said he would get it done for an awesome price!! about a month and a half later went to go pick up my trailer...........wasn't built to my design specs and didn't give me the jacks I requested. When I asked Jake about why I didn't get the two speed jacks I requested, his response was " well when I looked them up and realized they were $285 I decided to just got with the regular ones". Then when I questioned as to why it wasn't built to my design specs (9' tongue, 96" max out side dimensions, top deck needed the corners cut back for clearance) he said "Well that's what you get when you try to order a custom trailer over the phone". REALLY!!!!! His answer for why it was 102" versus 96" like asked for, his response was "Well all these tiny house companies are building them to 102" so that's what I did". I almost asked him were you building this trailer for me or for them??? Needless to say I walked away from this trailer without purchasing it. No money loss seeing as to how they don't require a down payment. I did however ask him to build me another one now that he knows exactly what I want and his reply was "The only way ill build you another one is if you pay for it in full. That way when you come to get it, its yours". If the man is not going to build me one the way I want it with no money down, he wont build me one right even if its paid in full. I should have taken all the previous reviews serious. If you do business with this company please be aware!!

resp.text: Douglas, we apologize for your experience. We are striving to serve our customers better. We are under new management and the  issues you raised have been corrected. Again, we apologize and hope to earn your trust back if you need another trailer in the future. Sincerely, thank you for the feedback.

name: Stacy White
text: Took several months to build my Simple 6x12 trailer  When I drove out of state to pick it up Some of the lights wasn't working none of them were the LED lights lthat I paid for. They did swap out the lights for LED and gave me a refund for the missing lights that I really wanted.  I wish they had better quality control especially after waiting several months for my build and  Driving out of state to pick it up.  I gave them 3 stars because I do like my  Trailer

resp.text: Stacy, thank you for the feedback... we sincerely appreciate the honest review. We are under new management and the quality issues you raised have been corrected. We look forward to serving you in the future. Thanks again.

name: Ninja Nation
text:
Worst company ever to deal business with, ordered a trailer two months ago and they told me it would be ready in two weeks  well here I am two months later I still don’t have my trailer.
I have called every week since and every week I’m told it’ll be next week week.  I finally made Brandi which is the lady that picks up the phone all the time promise me that it would be ready this week and that she would call me as right now it is Thursday towards the end of the week. I have not heard from her so I call her AGAIN and say hey Brandi haven’t heard from you is my trailer finally ready and her reply is let me put you on hold and see, she put me on hold for 30 minutes and hasn’t even called me back......worst experience of my life when I’m here offering to spend my hard-earned money!!!
I’m done with this company.... pathetic.

resp.text: SG, we apologize for your experience. We are striving to serve our customers better. We are under new management and the issues you raised have been corrected. Again, we apologize and hope to earn your trust back if you need another trailer in the future. We sincerely thank you for the feedback.

name: Bobby Rodgers
text: Great customer service. Easy to work with on special ordered trailers. Very friendly atmosphere.

resp.text: Bobby, thank you for your review!

name: delvin martin
text: We Got a 24' gooseneck tiny house frame... it was the cheapest built and poorest quality trailer we ever saw!  It pulls crooked driving down the road. The tires stick out an inch more on the 1 side than the other. There is not 1 wire connector on it ....they are just twisted together and then taped up!   The leveling jacks were welded on crooked! The trailer is not near DOT compliant ...no side marker lights and no license plate mount or light!    And the gooseneck was built too low that pulling it with a stock height 2500 the front tires are completely off the road!

resp.text: Delvin, thank you for the honest feedback.  I sincerely apologize for the issues with your tiny house trailer.  I would like to discuss these issues with you and see what we can do to rectify.

name: brandon brawner
text: Bought a 7 x 14 trailer with side gate owned for about 3 months now very happy with the trailer well built would recommend anyone to buy a trailer here reasonable priced drove from Georgia to pick it up thanks

name: Nathan Pope
text: Dropped off a trailer for a repair. I was told it would only be a couple days and a month later still no fix. I had to go pick it up and carry it somewhere else. They did not even say I am sorry for not fixing it. Acted as though they could care less about what I was told.

name: Ronald Lyons
text:
I called to see if they could install a trailer hitch on my car.
They said yes but I might have to leave it over night. I dropped it off just after 7:00 am one morning and they said they would call me when it was ready.  The next morning around 7:00am they called and said a trailer hitch couldn't be put on my car and I could come and pick it up.  I looked it up on the Internet and found instructions for installation.  I took the instructions with me and they said maybe somebody else might could of it but they couldn't.

name: Toni Lynn
text: I recently bought a Stryker trailer from these guys, I love the trailer it is well built; Although on our way home with the trailer it had a wobble to it. we did not think much of it at the time until we used it the very next day to haul our dirtbikes to the track- the trailer still had the wobble bad so I called the company back and talked to a woman about the issue and she informed me that, "who I needed to talk to was eating lunch at the time and also with a customer  and to leave my number and they would call back- needless to say no one ever contacted me about the issue with the trailer so I had it checked out myself... Turns out the wheels were about to fall off because the hubs were loose. Good thing I had it checked out by professionals. crappy customer service.

name: Todd Elkins
text: I ordered a trailer over a month ago. I originally was told it would be ready in two weeks. I called two weeks later and was told it would be another " week or so" and that I would be contacted when it was ready....I still have not been contacted. I bought a trailer elsewhere.

name: Joseph Albright
text: Quality affordable products.

resp.text: Joseph, thank you for the feedback... we really appreciate the review. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: John “Sid” Ogden
text: As with previous poster, the location is approx 5 miles further south along AL-21 (note: south on AL-21 at this point is actually traveling WEST on the compass). The actual location is right at mile marker 272. Hope this helps.

name: Jeff Masingale
text: Had a issue with my new trailer and called Stryker they came to Chattanooga and got it took it back and made it right. Thanks Stryker trailers.

resp.text: Jeff, thank you for the feedback... we look forward to serving you in the future!

name: CINDY SMITH
text: We dropped off our trailer to have it rewired and was told it would only take a couple of days. We called back two weeks later and it was coincidently in the shop being fixed right then and would be ready the next morning. It was in the shop when we got there. As they were pulling the trailer out of the garage they hit the trailer fender on the door and caused damage that will need repair. The wiring work is shoddy with no wire protection. They also removed the battery box from inside the tool box at the front of the trailer, discarded it, and just installed a bracket to sit the battery on. We are very disappointed with their customer service and their work. We won't be back.

name: Kyleigh Snow
text: Rude owner with no manners.

resp.text: Skittles, we apologize for your experience. We are striving to serve our customers better. We are under new management and from now on you will not encounter anyone on our staff with rude manners. Again, we apologize and hope to earn your trust back if you need another trailer in the future. Sincerely, thank you for the feedback.

name: Babs Cagle
text: Read all reviews before you buy from these people! Check your wheels! They could pass you on the highway as you are driving away from this place. Then check again before you leave from the “repair”. Awful customer service.

resp.text: Babs, we apologize for your experience. We are striving to serve our customers better. We are under new management and the quality issues you raised have been corrected. Again, we apologize and hope to earn your trust back if you need another trailer in the future. We sincerely thank you for the feedback.

name: Susan McClendon
text: Rude & unresponsive

resp.text: Susan, it is certainly hard to disagree since it has taken us this long to reply to your comment.  I have just taken an active role in the business and hope to help change this.  Please call the office and ask for Stuart.  I would love to hear more about how we can improve.  Take care.

name: Ryan Johnson
text: Very disappointed in the quality

resp.text: Ryan, we apologize for your experience. We are striving to serve our customers better. We are under new management any quality issues that lead to your review have been corrected. Again, we apologize and hope to earn your trust back if you need another trailer in the future. Thank you for the feedback.

name: Larry Evans
text: Great value, great trailer

resp.text: Larry, thank you for the feedback... we really appreciate the review. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Al Wood
text: Quality trailers,  nice folk!

name: Bart Withrow
text: Quality is subpar clearly have rookie fabrication skills for the price they charge for the trailers for a little bit more you can go first class with another brand returned trailer got refund and bought a bear trailer never been happier

name: Britany Benoit
text: If you are coming from Piedmont, it is about 5 more miles down the road from this marker.

name: Melanie Garza
text: Love the people, love the place, love the work I do!

name: Joseph Harvey
text: As always it was great

resp.text: Hi Joseph. Our team appreciates the positive review! Dorsey Trailers is committed to building the most durable trailers on the road so we're always happy to hear about the great experiences our customers have had. We hope you have a great day!

name: Dennis Hassinger
text: Ordered a new lowpro stepdeck and had a lot of problems with it,  but I stopped at the plant and talked to them in person and everything will be taken care of and done right. These guys are so great to deal with, they listen to want you want and then build it!!!! I'm so glad I stopped at the plant, I'm very excited to get my new trailer!!!!! Dealing with them directly is great!!!!

name: Eugene Machuga
text: Awesome place great people.. can't wait to buy a trailer here for my new business.

name: Swimming Bird
text: Very poor employer. Does not take care of employees. Hires a tremendous amount of drug addicts. Pay is not worth all the stress that comes with the job. Management is very shady.

resp.text: Hello, we are extremely disappointed to hear about your recent experience with us. Our team goes above and beyond to ensure each employee is happy and has fulfilling work each day. Please directly contact us at (334) 897-2525 to further discuss your concerns. Take care.

name: Platform Freight
text: Good trailer but in less that 1 year we went through  too many valves and tires. The double coin tires are terrible. You guys have to go a different brand. I swapped 6 tires in 9 months. Also when you do steel and aluminum rims you have to have the valve stems right. You can't get to the stem on the inside

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We take your concerns very seriously and will take them under advisement. Please contact us directly so we may help find solutions to your concerns.
We hope to hear from you soon - have a great day.

name: wariye abdinur seefka
text: Very quick unloaded very good space  wonderful people

resp.text: Hi there, thank you for your wonderful rating and awesome feedback. Our team at Dorsey Trailer takes pride in our excellent customer service and professionalism. We hope you continue to choose us for all of your trailer needs!

name: BIG NICK M
text: Work place is straight

name: Richard Boatwright
text: Good place to work.Been working here a few months. People are friendly and helpful

name: Cristhian Ruiz
text: Great place and good service and great people 😍😍

resp.text: Thanks so much for this short but sweet feedback! We're happy to hear that you had a great experience and hope to see you again; take care!

name: Zachary “Karl” Grant
text: Cause they got the best paint team in the world . Mr. Cactus Jack lol roll tide

name: Caleb Smith
text: Pretty cool place, I worked here for a few days, people are awesome their.

name: Darko1113
text: Nice people, quick unloading

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to share this short but sweet feedback! We're happy to hear that you had a great experience with our team and hope to see you again; take care!

name: Chris Walden
text: A lot of people

resp.text: Hi Chris, thank you for taking the time to leave your review and rating. At Dorsey Trailer, we strive to provide a family-friendly atmopshere and grea customer service. We hope our dedication coninutes to show for years to come!

name: josh malmberg
text: Was In and out cause  2 fork lifts were unloading me.

name: James Cole
text: Great place to work.

name: Christopher Ross
text: Good job

name: Twanskey Colvin
text: I had a very  satisfying experience at Trailer World. Chris is a real down to earth guy. You can’t help but to like him....lol...but he helped me in every way he could and he kept his word all the way down to the last signature. I’ll most definitely be doing business there again and I would recommend Trailer World to anyone. And very well built Trailers. Thanks Chris! 🙏🏾

name: The Adventurous Mom
text:
CP was helpful and nice with purchase of trailer. Prices are great too.

The only bad thing is, when I got home I did a thorough inspection and find a big scratch on the fender.  I wish I had noticed this there but I did not. :(  The company response was that it wouldn't rust and they aren't sure how it got there.

name: Zach Lott
text: Phenomenal customer service by Chris Wallace.  Brought my trailer in that I bought from another dealer because the tail and running lights and one interior light were not working. He quickly determined it was a blown fuse for the tail and running lights and helped me repair the interior light on the spot without charging me. I was expecting to have to drop off the trailer to get it fixed. I was in and out in 30 minutes. It  was awesome to have someone make life a lot easier that day. Can't recommend Chris and Trailer World Alabama enough. To put it simply, he is one solid dude and sincerely wants to take care of customers! Every business could use a guy of his caliber! Thanks again Chris for the help; you're the man!

name: Camelia Shears
text: If you’re looking to purchase a trailer you should definitely make this your first stop. They have great prices and a very helpful and friendly staff. I had the pleasure of being helped by Chris. Chris provided me an excellent customer service experience and for that reason I am a loyal customer for life. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: ashley allen
text: Great service, friendly staff. We're so excited

resp.text: Thank you, Ashley!

name: Kevin Seahorn
text: Amazing people to deal with. Chris was great, made everything so easy and and a quick turnaround.on the trailer. I will definitely be back again and send all my friends to them. You can't go wrong

name: Chris Sowell
text: Purchased multiple trailers over the years. Some directly from the inventory yard while others have been custom made. Always have been happy with each trailer. My needs/purpose changed which always led me back to trailer world to mfg my new one. Great service and they have always stood behind any issues that came up (which thankfully was many many years ago). Does what it was built for and fits everything I need!

name: Herbert Agueda
text: I'm thoroughly pleased with my experience with Trailer World, If you're in the market for a trailer, this should be your go to place!! Chris is very knowledgeable and more than willing to jump thru hoops to make sure you get exactly what you're looking for!! They won't try to sell you something you don't need. Quality construction done in a timely manner and you won't feel like you just came from the proctologist office!! First rate customer service, friendly staff, well built equipment, what else could you ask for?

name: Nathan Ring
text: Wonderful company and Wonderful people! Would recommend to anyone and everyone, you won’t be disappointed!

name: Chase Lawrence
text: Great quality trailers at a reasonable and affordable price with excellent customer service to match 👌🏼

name: taylor starling
text: Trevor was amazing! He was so helpful when I purchased my trailer!

name: david vitulski
text: Great selection of trailers at very reasonable prices and the staff was courteous, very helpful and professional.

name: Jesus Catala
text: Highly recommend this place if you need to buy or service your trailer.

name: Cameron Lee
text: Great products and excellent customer service! Highly recommended!

name: Robbie Swanson
text: Great service..absolutely best pricing..and the staff was more than willing to meet my needs. I would say if you are in need of a trailer or anything having to do with a trailer go to trailer world in Ozark..

name: Ellen Farmer
text: Incredible company! Everyone is so nice and helpful.

name: Hobie Turvin
text: Great customer and always will to help! Chris always goes above and beyond for what I need!

name: Trent Sanders
text: BEST SERVICE!! HIGHLY RECCOMEND

name: Emily Wallace
text: Great place, Chris was very knowledgeable and willing to help!

name: phillip aldenderfer
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff, extremely happy with service.

name: Rock Estes
text: Great product.  Love my trailer!!!

name: Trevor Adkins
text: Great place, Trevor was very informative and helpful

name: Neelee Wallace
text: chris is an amazing salesman he was very kind and helpful.

name: dan chandler
text: Bought trailor in December. promised next week,next week next week.  it is March now.

name: Silverback STFFST
text: Great place great staff

name: Barry Jones
text: Want return any of my calls tried 4 different times

resp.text: Hey Barry I’m sorry for the inconvenience. What’s a good number or email to reach you? I’ll have a manager reach out first thing in the morning and we will do our best to earn your business back.

name: PAKMAIL PAKMAIL
text: Great product and great people

name: Heather Lynn
text: When you get there there's great customer service and very helpful and great salesperson

name: Sunny Clark
text: Superb customer service! Very helpful!

name: Josh Penton
text: Friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Ken Faint
text: Nice, friendly and knowledgeable sales staff.  Thank you Chris for jumping through hoops to get my last minute tire upgrade done. This is probably a half dozen trailers I've bought from these guys and I will be back for the next one too!

name: Shiftie Mcgee
text: The only thing keeping me from shopping here, is the fact they don't even list a base price for their products. Sadly, I'm sure I'm not the only person to do this.

resp.text: Hey Shiftie, I'm sorry you feel that way. You can call any Trailer World dealership and a salesmen can price you any trailer we offer. You can also email whatever is easiest

name: Ryan Pope
text: Quick and painless, very competitive pricing and offered several financing options! Thanks Chris!

name: bcflys
text: A little bit of a drive, but worth the customer service and the quality of their products. These guys are pro's and will listen and get you in the perfect trailer for a great price. This is my 3rd major perchase with trailorworld. And I'm very happy with the deal and my new LoadTrail trailers. Chris went above and beyond getting my trailers set up exactly the way I wanted them. Thank you guys.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review and thank you for your business!

name: Alex Wetherington
text: I’ve purchased 4 trailers now from trailer world and always been happy until I purchased my most recent trailer a 6x16 I had custom built. After about a week of having this trailer I noticed the the paint chipping pretty bad on the wheel wells, I called and they sent me a can of spray paint to cover over it. It’s now been about 2 months since I’ve had the trailer and the whole trailer is chipping paint really really bad. The trailers I’ve had in the past have never had this problem but this trailer is chipping extremely bad.

name: Shane Key
text: Had everything ready for me!

name: Nikki Haire
text: I had to buy trailer tires for my boat a few weeks ago.  They were an odd size, but they had them in stock.  These guys were great!  Clay and Bo will be getting my business for all of my future trailer needs!

name: Frankie Sutton
text: After having my trailer for 2 weeks they managed to change one brake assembly. I picked up trailer today after them telling me it could be monday or so before they could finish it. Brought trailer home to install other brake assembly and brakes still not working. After I finally got brakes working correctly on the assmbly I installed, I removed hub that they installed on the same side on the rear tandem. When removing the hub I removed the hub nuts with my hand, they werent even tight. After removing hub and inspecting it noticed that the new seal they had installed was goulded and the spindle was also goulded. Have to replace seal again on the new one they just installed. Have had issues with brakes from the day i purchased trailer. I run hotshot loads and cant afford to be down as long as they had my trailer and still have to go behind them to replace stuff. I have replaced the seals on this trailer twice now and replaced 2 magnets on the brakes with no warranty applied. As for as purchasing trailer I could not ask for better service, but maintenance and offering warranty coverage for parts, there has not been any mention of it other than the brake assemblies.

name: Fred Eurich
text: It was a pleasure to do business with. Great price on the trailer. Everyone was kind and professional. Thank you.

name: Daniel Ring
text: Knowledgeable, helpful and friendly sales people.  Best prices in the region for Brand New Trailers!

name: Kolby Green
text: It has competitive utility/equipment trailer prices.

name: Art V
text: Great folks that work there ..!

resp.text: Thank you, Art!

name: Tammy Narup
text: These guys are rock stars!!! Wheel bearing went out on our trailer, we wound up buying a new trailer, they went way above and beyond to help us get the new trailer set up for business and back on the road! Thanks guys, you saved the trip!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review!

name: Debie Lynn
text:
we were all excited about being able to empty out a rented storage  and be able to have all our belongs with us.  My husband works on the road and we travel alot.  Got to this place and there was one man working.  Two ppl ahead of us.  He told us he would be with us after them. Understandable right? WRONG.  More ppl showed up and he never waited on us. We had CASH money and CAME to BUY. Hate he missed a great sell and I hope he thought it was worth the loss of a sale and a
BAD reputation when ppl ask us about it.

name: Jeff White
text: Good place to get a trailer.

name: Kevin Pitcock
text: Best value on the market. The craftsmanship and attention to detail surpasses other small time builders at a price that is fair. For the $ you won't find anything better. Built to last!

name: Kevin Ellison
text: Excellent staff with excellent service. I would personally advise anyone in need of a trailer to speak with Chris. His professionalism, in my opinion, is top notch and can't be matched. He will work tirelessly in order to ensure the best deal possible, along with providing outstanding customer satisfaction.

name: Andrew Jones
text: Solid company that makes well built and reliable trailers.  I will always buy my trailers from trailer world!

name: Neil Simmons
text: Trailer world is the best. It’s the only place to go if you need a trailer. Their staff and prices are second to none.

name: Ted Herring
text: Awesome service. Great products, trailers are top quality,  not cheap, but quality and that's what We need.  Thank you.

name: charles cutts
text: Awesome people to work with and great product. This is our 2nd trailer we have bought from them.

name: Johnny Kincey
text: Great customer service and a fantastic trailer

name: Jeffrey Barth
text: Very helpful staff and have a good knowledge of their products.  Price i paid for tow doll was great.

name: Glen Pratt
text: Friendly and knowledgeable personnel. Good prices on quality trailers.

name: Summer Knight
text:
All of us kids and grandkids bought  a trailer for our grandfather because he is always helping somebody move something or build something. We ran out of ideas. His birthday is the same as Thanksgiving this year so he was shocked and thrilled by a surprise party plus Thanksgiving. Thank you Mr Bradley for all your hard work dealing with the whole family and a few friends. We looked at every single trailer on the lot more than once. It took us several months to raise the money but we did it!
We bought the  6’ x 12’ white trailer. Our grandpa is out of that lazy boy and going again. 🙌🏼 We need to get him some steps next for the back of his truck.

name: Gary Mcallister
text: Great place to get a trailer. Friendly staff. Prices are reasonable.

name: Jesica Woods
text: Dothan Al dose not answer the phone and you can not leave a message so they can return your call.

name: Joe F. Watson
text: Great place to buy utility trailer at an affordable price.

name: Johnny Spann
text: Well Andrew was a pretty good guy with a likable personality and the guy knows what he is doing when we hooked the trailer up to my 2016 4 runner some of the lights didn't work Andrew said man you have a blown fuse I said nope new truck but I checked anyway and old Andrew was right. Well they just got my business next time I need another trailer

name: Anita Baird
text: Excellent customer service and excellent selection. Will definitely go back for all of our trailer needs.

name: Edwin Knowles
text: Good people and will help you

name: Laketh Sweet
text: Great!

name: Ram 2017
text:
I went to trailer world to buy a trailer that i had spoke with the sales man a day before and i had asked him tge price of it which he told me. So i said i would be down the next day to get it. When i got there the next day i had ask him alittle more info on the trailer well he acted like he didn't know that much about it. So i said this is the one that we talked about the day before. So he just stood there like he didn't  remember. So i ssid this is the one that you told me the price. Then i told him the price and he said no thst not the price i had drove 110 miles to he's company and now he change the price. We went inside and he acted like he didn't  want to sale the trailer at all. Very cold to me NOT professional at all. So i left his store after driving 110 miles. WOW VERY POOR  SALES PERSON..
WELL NOT EVER GO BACK AND WELL TELL VERY BODY ABOUT THAT PLACE.

name: Pamela McKinney
text: Drove from Florida to purchased a trailer and the guy stayed after hours until we got there, even in the rain.  Awesome customer service...highly recommend.

name: Paul Guerrero
text: Not much of a world more of a lot.

name: Roger Jones
text: Good price on our trailer and well built still going strong

name: Charles Petty
text: Had the tire I needed at a reasonable price.

name: jerry chandler
text: Had the parts for my rig . Mr.jerry

name: Donnie Skinner
text: Great people and prices!
